english.segment2: Turn your ear. To heaven and hear. The noise inside. The sound of angels awe. The sound of angels songs. And all this for a King. We could join and sing. All to Christ the King
english.segment3: How constant, how divine. This song of ours will rise. O, how constant, how divine. This love of ours will rise. Will rise
english.segment4: O praise Him. O praise Him. He is Holy. He is Holy
english.segment5: Turn your gaze. To heaven and raise. A joyous noise. The sound of salvation come. The sound of rescued ones. And all this for a King. Angels join to sing. All for Christ our King
english.segment6: Oh la, la, la, la, la, la
english.segment7: How infinite and sweet. This love so rescuing. O, how infinitely sweet. This great love that has redeemed. As one we sing
english.segment8: Alleluia. Alleluia. He is Holy. He is Holy. (Yeah)
